resources.string: Lower Body – try an advanced move!
Upper Body – try an advanced move!

- Tricep Dip 3 x 12 reps
- Push Ups 3 x 10 reps
- Side Planks 3 x 12 reps
- Plank Ups 3 x 10 reps

- Squat 3 x 10 reps
- Side Lunge 3 x 12 reps
- Back Lunge and Lift 3 x 10 reps
- Curtsy Lunge 3 x 10 reps
- Calf Raises 30
- Wide Leg Open-Toe Squat 20
